Ingredients.4: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.5: 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste

Ingredients.6: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

Directions.1: Combine olive oil, parsley, garlic, salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes in a bowl. Add shrimp and mix well. Set aside to marinade for 10 minutes.

Directions.2: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat.

Directions.3: Lay out a large piece of aluminum foil and fold in half. Fold up edges to create a pouch in the middle. Place marinated shrimp in the middle and drizzle with lemon juice. Lightly close pouch.

Directions.4: Cook on the hot grill until shrimp are pink and cooked through, 8 to 10 minutes. Serve with lemon wedges.
